name: Outbreak: Legacy
description:
Do you remember how marble games used to be played?

Hunched over, in the dirt, waiting your turn… Say goodbye to the past and hello to marble games that rely on speed, imagination, and new twists and turns!

Outbreak: Legacy is as innovative brick-breaker game which has added a slew of new, unique features.

Control a paddle in the marble ring and choose 8 marbles with exciting buffs and debuffs to complete 30 levels! You’ll never want to go back to shooting marbles in the dirt after playing Outbreak: Legacy!

Enjoy our new Endless Mode feature when challenging 5 bosses.

Watch your achievements increase as your strength and skill improve!


GAME FEATURES:

- Easy-to-learn and fast-paced, addictive gameplay
- Extremely intense collisions with stunning visual and sound effects create a powerful experience for players.
- Each level’s distinct style, vivid characters and innovative brick-breaker design will captivate you you won’t be able to put this game down!
- Crazy-fun buffs & debuffs make this game a blast!
